statements: SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_cases;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_contact_info FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data > 1000;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id = 456;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_contact_info FROM legal_cases WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT case_id, client_id FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT case_id, case_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases ORDER BY financial_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_contact_info FROM legal_cases WHERE client_contact_info IS NOT NULL;
SELECT case_id, case_name, client_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id = 789 AND financial_data > 2000;
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM legal_cases;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT AVG(financial_data) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT MAX(financial_data) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT MIN(financial_data) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT SUM(financial_data) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, financial_data, financial_data*1.1 AS increased_financial_data FROM legal_cases;
SELECT client_id, client_name, financial_data, financial_data*0.9 AS decreased_financial_data FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM legal_cases ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(financial_data) AS max_financial_data FROM legal_cases;
SELECT AVG(financial_data) AS avg_financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data < 10000;
SELECT case_name, client_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT MIN(financial_data) AS min_financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id = 200;
SELECT case_id, case_name, client_name FROM legal_cases WHERE client_contact_info LIKE '%email%';
SELECT AVG(financial_data) AS avg_financial_data, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data > 10000 GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT SUM(financial_data) AS total_financial_data FROM legal_cases GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY total_financial_data DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(financial_data) AS total_financial_data FROM legal_cases GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_financial_data > 5000;
SELECT case_id, client_id, financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data = (SELECT MAX(financial_data) FROM legal_cases);
SELECT client_name, COUNT(*) AS case_count FROM legal_cases GROUP BY client_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT case_name, client_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases ORDER BY financial_data DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT AVG(financial_data) AS avg_financial_data, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data < 5000 GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_cases > 1;
SELECT client_id, SUM(financial_data) AS total_financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data > 10000 GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT client_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data > 5000);
SELECT case_id, case_name, client_contact_info FROM legal_cases WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT case_id, client_name, financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data = (SELECT MIN(financial_data) FROM legal_cases WHERE client_id = 100);
SELECT client_name, COUNT(*) AS case_count FROM legal_cases GROUP BY client_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY case_count DESC;
SELECT client_id, MAX(financial_data) AS max_financial_data FROM legal_cases WHERE financial_data < 5000 GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY max_financial_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_description FROM legal_cases;
SELECT * FROM client_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_date FROM client_activities;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT client_id, transaction_date FROM financial_data;
SELECT lawyer_name FROM legal_cases;
SELECT activity_description FROM client_activities;
SELECT amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status='active';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status='closed';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE lawyer_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM client_activities WHERE activity_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM client_activities WHERE client_id=12345;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT CASE WHEN amount > 1000 THEN 'Big Transaction' ELSE 'Small Transaction' END AS transaction_type FROM financial_data;
SELECT case_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY case_id;
SELECT case_status, COUNT(*) AS case_count FROM legal_cases GROUP BY case_status;
SELECT client_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE lawyer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT case_description, case_status FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id = 5;
SELECT client_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM client_activities WHERE client_id = 10 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM financial_data GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_amount_spent > 5000;
SELECT lawyer_name, COUNT(*) AS case_count FROM legal_cases GROUP BY lawyer_name HAVING case_count > 3;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT MIN(amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 15;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT legal_cases.case_id, legal_cases.case_description, client_activities.activity_description FROM legal_cases JOIN client_activities ON legal_cases.case_id = client_activities.client_id;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM client_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY client_id HAVING activity_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM client_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%meeting%';

SELECT legal_cases.case_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM legal_cases LEFT JOIN client_activities ON legal_cases.case_id = client_activities.client_id GROUP BY legal_cases.case_id ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_amount_spent < 5000;
SELECT client_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount_spent FROM financial_data GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY max_amount_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount_spent, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m') AS month_year FROM financial_data GROUP BY month_year;
SELECT DISTINCT lawyer_name FROM legal_cases;

SELECT legal_cases.case_id, legal_cases.case_description, financial_data.amount FROM legal_cases INNER JOIN financial_data ON legal_cases.case_id = financial_data.client_id ORDER BY financial_data.amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT lawyer_name) AS unique_lawyers_count FROM legal_cases;
SELECT client_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount_spent FROM financial_data GROUP BY client_id HAVING average_amount_spent > 2000;
SELECT financial_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT lawyer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases_count FROM legal_cases GROUP BY lawyer_name;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM client_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_date FROM client_activities WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM financial_data;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM financial_data;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id = 3;
SELECT activity_id, client_id, activity_description FROM client_activities WHERE client_id = 200;
SELECT transaction_id, client_id, transaction_date FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 300;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_cases FROM legal_cases;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM client_activities;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM financial_data;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 400;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 500;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 600;
SELECT MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = 700;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_name LIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id = 10
SELECT * FROM client_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT client_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY client_id
SELECT client_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY client_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 1000
SELECT * FROM legal_cases lc JOIN client_activities ca ON lc.case_id = ca.client_id
SELECT * FROM legal_cases lc LEFT JOIN client_activities ca ON lc.case_id = ca.client_id
SELECT * FROM financial_data fd INNER JOIN client_activities ca ON fd.client_id = ca.client_id
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) FROM financial_data
SELECT MIN(transaction_amount) FROM financial_data
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM client_activities GROUP BY client_id
SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM financial_data
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-02-28'
SELECT case_name, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM legal_cases lc JOIN client_activities ca ON lc.case_id = ca.client_id GROUP BY case_name
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT case_id, case_name, transaction_amount FROM legal_cases lc JOIN financial_data fd ON lc.case_id = fd.client_id
SELECT client_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY client_id
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_activities)
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM client_activities WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-15')
SELECT client_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01' GROUP BY client_id
SELECT * FROM legal_cases lc JOIN financial_data fd ON lc.case_id = fd.client_id WHERE transaction_amount > 5000
SELECT client_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 GROUP BY client_id
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM LegalCases;
SELECT * FROM ClientActivities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM ClientActivities;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM FinancialData;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Clients;
SELECT case_name, client_name FROM LegalCases JOIN Clients ON LegalCases.client_id = Clients.client_id;
SELECT case_name, activity_name FROM LegalCases JOIN ClientActivities ON LegalCases.client_id = ClientActivities.client_id;
SELECT client_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM Clients JOIN FinancialData ON Clients.client_id = FinancialData.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT client_id) AS total_clients FROM Clients;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM FinancialData;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM FinancialData;
SELECT client_type, COUNT(client_id) AS total_clients FROM Clients GROUP BY client_type;
SELECT CASE WHEN transaction_amount > 1000 THEN 'High Value' ELSE 'Low Value' END AS transaction_category FROM FinancialData;
SELECT client_name, CASE WHEN client_type = 'VIP' THEN 'Special' ELSE 'Regular' END AS client_category FROM Clients;
SELECT * FROM LegalCases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM ClientActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_type = 'Individual';
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM LegalCases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_type = 'Corporate';
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Clients WHERE client_type = 'Individual';
SELECT c.client_name, c.client_address, f.transaction_amount FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT l.case_name, c.client_name, f.transaction_id FROM LegalCases l JOIN Clients c ON l.client_id = c.client_id JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT c.client_name, COUNT(l.case_id) AS total_cases FROM Clients c LEFT JOIN LegalCases l ON c.client_id = l.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name, SUM(f.transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name, AVG(f.transaction_amount) AS avg_spent FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name, MAX(f.transaction_amount) AS max_spent FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name, MIN(f.transaction_amount) AS min_spent FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;

SELECT c.client_name, COUNT(l.case_id) AS total_cases, SUM(f.transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM Clients c LEFT JOIN LegalCases l ON c.client_id = l.client_id JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name, COUNT(distinct l.case_id) AS unique_cases FROM Clients c JOIN LegalCases l ON c.client_id = l.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY f.transaction_amount DESC) AS spending_rank FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT c.client_name, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY f.transaction_amount DESC) AS dense_rank FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT c.client_name, NTILE(4) OVER (ORDER BY f.transaction_amount DESC) AS spending_quartile FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT c.client_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f.transaction_amount DESC) AS row_number FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT c.client_name, LEAD(f.transaction_amount) OVER (ORDER BY f.transaction_amount) AS next_transaction_amount FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT c.client_name, LAG(f.transaction_amount) OVER (ORDER BY f.transaction_amount) AS prev_transaction_amount FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;

SELECT c.client_name, FIRST_VALUE(f.transaction_amount) OVER (PARTITION BY c.client_id ORDER BY f.transaction_amount) AS first_transaction_amount FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;

SELECT c.client_name, LAST_VALUE(f.transaction_amount) OVER (PARTITION BY c.client_id ORDER BY f.transaction_amount) AS last_transaction_amount FROM Clients c JOIN FinancialData f ON c.client_id = f.client_id;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM client_activities;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM client_activities WHERE client_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-987654321cba';
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, report_type FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE email = 'user@example.com';
SELECT case_name, case_type, case_status FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM client_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, activity_type FROM client_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT financial_id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'open';
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'criminal';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'monthly';
SELECT username, role FROM users;
SELECT case_name, case_type, case_status FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'closed' OR case_type = 'civil';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM client_activities WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT sum(amount) FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-06-01' AND report_type = 'quarterly';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'client';
SELECT case_name, case_type, case_status FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'criminal' AND case_status = 'open';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM client_activities WHERE activity_type = 'meeting' AND activity_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM legal_cases;
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM reports;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role != 'client';
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'pending' ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_type IN ('monthly', 'quarterly');
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager';
SELECT MAX(amount) FROM financial_data WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
